logistic.R: Metaquest integration backlog across automation, indices, and governance hooks
logistic.Theta: Parity brief anchored in docs/utac_status_alignment_v1.2.md + codexfeedback entry
logistic.zeta: Damped when indices refresh and telemetry reports land within one sprint

meta.resonance:
Ensures the Metaquest launch is braided into the UTAC system spine: each
automation hook, index refresh, and codex echo stays synchronised so the
campaign can inherit reproducible logistics without fragmenting the
Bedeutungs-/Shadow pairing.

existing_assets.title: UTAC Status Matrix Handshake
existing_assets.resonance: Maps Metaquest checkpoints onto activation gaps and telemetry needs.

notes.logistic_coupling:
When R swells, the matrix routes actions to archive scripts and
codex updates before β steepens.

existing_assets.title: System Meaning Membrane (parent)
existing_assets.resonance: Holds automation + governance lanterns that Metaquest must plug into.

notes.logistic_coupling:
Metaquest inherits the Makefile and schema guards; Θ remains visible via
codex mandates.

existing_assets.title: Shadow System Membrane
existing_assets.resonance: Provides failure thresholds for codex drift, index lag, and telemetry gaps.

notes.logistic_coupling: Defines when ζ(R) spikes so Metaquest alerts can trigger remediation.

existing_assets.title: Metaquest Parity Brief
existing_assets.resonance: Condenses mq-parity actions so parity telemetry, simulator playlists, and codex hooks stay aligned.

notes.logistic_coupling: Provides Θ checkpoints for telemetry timestamp, endorsement ledger, and codex entry whenever Metaquest assets update.

existing_assets.title: Metaquest Bridge Index
existing_assets.resonance: Synchronises system automation checkpoints with campaign cadence via shared bridge dashboard.

notes.logistic_coupling:
Ensures telemetry timestamps, codex ids, and BreakPoint notes land in both
beacons; stale bridge entries escalate via mq-bridge-shadow-001.

needed_resonances.description: Populate parity brief with telemetry timestamp, simulator playlist, endorsement ledger, and codex ID.

threshold.Theta: brief lists latest telemetry date + codex reference before launch freeze

needed_resonances.null_guard: Missing timestamp or codex reference escalates to sci-shadow-003 and sys-shadow-004.

needed_resonances.description: Implement scripts/sigillin_sync.py telemetry export with Metaquest parity metrics.
needed_resonances.null_guard: If no report for >1 sprint, trigger sys-shadow-003 audit.

needed_resonances.description: Index refresh automation extended to Metaquest folders.

threshold.Theta: indices list Metaquest sigils within 24h of change

needed_resonances.null_guard: Parser diff showing Δindex parity > 0 for one commit activates shadow guard.

needed_resonances.description: Ensure Bedeutungs-/Shadow sigils and indices cite latest parity brief update.

threshold.Theta: parity brief update mirrored in indices + codex within 24h

needed_resonances.null_guard: If indices lack newest parity note, trigger sys-shadow-001 and mq-sys-shadow-004.

needed_resonances.description: Infuse Metaquest automation notes with BreakPoint rituals + publishing cadence.

threshold.Theta: Metaquest parity notes cite latest BreakPoint ritual within codex entry

needed_resonances.null_guard: If BreakPoint references absent, escalate to mq-sys-shadow-003.

needed_resonances.description: Mirror bridge dashboard timestamp + codex id inside the system beacon.

threshold.Theta: system map cites latest bridge telemetry timestamp within 24h

needed_resonances.null_guard: Bridge timestamp drift triggers mq-bridge-shadow-001 and mq-sys-shadow-004.

activation_hooks.response: Update trilayer files, refresh indices, log codex entry, cite status matrix.
Consult shadow map, schedule sigillin_sync run, update docs + codex.
Cross-link change in docs, codex, and simulator presets; archive previous version.

null_model_reference.description: Null = Metaquest launch without documented parity; automation + governance decouple.

monitoring.condition: Metaquest folders listed in seed_index.* and feldtheorie_index.*
